casebody.data:
VALLEY TRANSP., INC.
v.
NORTH CAROLINA DEPT. OF CRIME CONTROL & PUBLIC SAFETY, DIV. OF STATE HIGHWAY PATROL, MOTOR CARRIER ENFORCEMENT SECTION. No. COA08-909. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed February 3, 2009. Certification Date February 23, 2009. Appeal from Wake (07CVS12921).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed.
